original_title: It's a Big, Big World: Be Healthy and Happy
overview: Join Snook the sloth and his menagerie of animal friends -- including Madge the map turtle and sibling monkeys Smooch and Winslow -- for colorful lessons about living a happy and healthy life, no matter what species you are. Over the course of four episodes, kids will learn about the value of exercise, why it's important to eat a balanced diet, how the heart works and why keeping the planet healthy is good for everyone.
title: It's a Big, Big World: Be Healthy and Happy
